object_store_observer Class Reference

Base class for object observer classes. More...

#include <typed_object_store_observer.hpp>

Detailed Description

Base class for object observer classes.

Template Parameters
TType of the object store observer When interested to observe
  • attach (prototype_node)
  • detach (prototype_node)
  • insert (object)
  • update (object)
  • delete (object) actions an observer class instance must be registered with object store. Use this class as base class for all observer classes.
